"The demon army is subdued as the blue hair comes out of the box.
The blue-eyed Chinese monk smiled and nodded his head.
Longtou Wang Xiao Jushi's name was Guanfu.
He stayed at Zhaokaku for a few days.
When he heard the sound of the opening of the stilling board, he had a thought.
He asked the south hall.
"There's a certain place that I've seen.
He had only just been asked about it.
But he couldn't open his mouth.
He hadn't realized it.
What was the mistake?
The hall said.
"The mistake is in the view that there's one.
The hall then asked.
"When will the morning service arrive?
The monk said.
On the fourth day of the eighth month last year.
The hall asked him.
"When did you leave the office since you were appointed inspector?
The minister said.
The month before last, on the 20th.

source_sentence: 堂曰為甚麼却道開口不得。
translation: The hall said, "Why is it that you can't open your mouth?
The public then realized his awakening.
Dharma Succession of the Fifth Patriarch, the Master of Zizen

source_sentence: 黃州府蘄州龍華高禪師上堂。
translation: The Chan Master Longhuagao of Huizhou Prefecture addressed the hall.
The elephant king practices the lion's abode.
Barefoot Kunlun Jiaozhao's eyebrows rose.
Gathering at Hanshan, he smiled and laughed.
He pointed out the old pine tree in front of his gate.
"How did he say.
What did he point out?
Suddenly, the wind blew it down.
It was a good pile of firewood.
Xuedeng zhengtong, vol. 4
